journals.notes: Tell us your value of g_landminetimeout. A value of 1 should remove landmines on team change (spawn).

My g_landminetimeout is set to value of 1. Landmines disappear on team change but what comes to dynamites, those don't.

-*S

> To me it would be most logical to make dynamites disappear when you go to spectators or are put there.

No, once planted a dynamite/landmine is part of the game. It doesn't matter if the original player is now in the spec team or if he left the game. XP should be awarded to the player, unless he left the game.

Oww I wasn't really awake that morning :D

I think we might change g_landminetimeout(int) to g_timeouts (bitsmask) and add a removal feature of dynamite optionally. But this is of low prio :) ... Actually players should stay in game!

>The second thing which it will cause, you won’t get any xp of the objective you destroyed. Also you won’t get any xp of the enemies while they get killed by the dynamite. But still it will show that YOU killed the player with the dynamite even you weren’t in the team, you were as spectator.

To me this behaviour is correct. The player is out of the world (=spectator) and the rest of the world shouldn't change. Spectators shouldn't get XPs - they are not in game.

subject: Dynamite doesn't disappear when going spectator
description:
How to reproduce this:

1. Take engineer
2. Plant dynamite near objective
3. Go to spectators

This causes a few things to happen. First of all, the objective you planted dynamite at, will explode. The second thing which it will cause, you won't get any xp of the objective you destroyed.  Also you won't get any xp of the enemies while they get killed by the dynamite. But still it will show that YOU killed the player with the dynamite even you weren't in the team, you were as spectator.

I don't know to which way this should be fixed. Make dynamites disappear when you go to spectator or then make dynamites gain the xp of all the kills and objectives it destroys. To me it would be most logical to make dynamites disappear when you go to spectators or are put there.

-*S
